name: Baking with Mewmories
description:
Description

Bake a late-night treat with help from your shadowy assistant who brings you the strangest ingredients. Each ghostly ingredient is a memory, a story.

Controls

  • Left-mouse click

Credits:

  • Art by @Haiyoooo (Download free art assets)
  • Code, Story by @maryphun

Made in a week for Brackeys Jam 2022, theme: "It is not real."
